name: Memento - Memory Game
description:
Memento is a memory / brain training game where you have to find matching cards/tiles. You can choose between 8 different tilesets (4 specially designed for kids) and two difficulty modes (12 or 24 tile board). It's a game for the whole family and plays great on phones and tablets.

Continuous matches are awarded extra as are lucky guesses.

You can choose between three soundtracks or complete silence.

It's a simple, colorful and entertaining brain training game for all ages.

(note: Scores aren't saved in this Windows version. In a next update a highscore system will be implemented. The Android version has a working highscore system)
